column4: checking whether build environment is sane... yes
checking for style of include used by make... GNU
stop flooding and don't compile xine
you've succeeded in annoying the whole channel for nothing
just do sudo apt-get install xine
it's OK - I guess you won't be doing *that* again ;-)
as a guide, always check to see if a package is available in synaptic, or use apt
if you follow that link and do as it says, it *will* work
